price: salvo cuando el fallo les es favorable, entonces lo acatan con sumisión.
arabic: وَإِن يَكُن لَّهُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّ يَأۡتُوٓاْ إِلَيۡهِ مُذۡعِنِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yakun lahumu al-ḥaqu yatū ilayhi mudh'ʿinīna
